catalog_info.title: Intermediate Persian I
catalog_info.notes: Instructor: Sheida Dayani. Not open to auditors. Cannot be taken pass/fail.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Persian AA/AB sequence, or the equivalent.
catalog_info.description: A thorough review and continuation of modern Persian grammar with an emphasis on reading, writing, speaking, and listening comprehension. Includes an introduction to classical prosody. Course materials draw from both classical and modern poetry and prose.
